subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Fabio Fognini, who sometimes throws tantrums that turn the crowd against him and derail his concentration, lost to Gaël Monfils, who often seems to put showmanship ahead of pragmatism.
snippet: Fabio Fognini, who sometimes throws tantrums that turn the crowd against him and derail his concentration, lost to Gaël Monfils, who often seems to put showmanship ahead of pragmatism.
